name: Eko Charnius Ilman (Eko)
review: It is not a big hospital but cares with your safety. It is not crowded at all which is why we choose this hospital to avoid Covid19 spreading. It is super clean since they claimed to clean most of stuff (i.e. chair) every three hours. The lift has been equipped with untouch button. However, it is better if they can improve their doors to be untouch/automatic doors as well to make it even more perfect experience. It provide quick service for a new patient as we are in holiday in this city. Hand sanitiser can be found everywhere which is good, even at some corner it is empty. Moreover, before entering the hospital, you should fill and pass their online Covid-19 screening. They will give you sticker , to be sticked on your clothes (green or yellow) depending on your risk ranking.

name: Theodora Rini
review: This place is superb among other hospitals in Semarang! I have never experienced such great hospitality in the hospital before. The medical staffs were friendly and professional. Super clean and didn‚Äôt have any ‚Äòhospital‚Äô smell alike. So convenient with the care I got from Siloam. The doctor explained my medical problem clearly with the most suitable solution for my condition. After one day, they contacted me asking for my condition after consuming the medical prescription from Siloam, just to confirm whether I‚Äôm getting better or not. For the price I‚Äôve paid, it‚Äôs not as expensive as I thought. Really satisfied with the care I got from Siloam. Thank you!

name: Baskara Widhi
review: I'm glad that this clinic have 24 hours services, but it takes so long just for doing antigen test. It got me almost 1 hour waiting time

name: Irfan Murtadho
review: Well organised Hospitals in Semarang, with several expertise doctors offered also. Supported by alodoctor if u need any assistant to book and see the doctors. However the facility and accomodation is not enough as like a parking lot, or queu rooms. Need to be improved

name: MsErynn8
review: My husband needed to flight out and thus required Covid19 pcr test urgently.We got it less than 24 hrs!Plz do come between 6-7 am(open everyday )and no appointment is needed otherwise.N get ur results in ur WA or email!!Thumbs up to the service given..To those who still hv some questions plz do download their app or go to their website -C19 Gold Package (look in the website or app for recent price)Thank you!

name: Sinta Ratna Dewayani
review: I made appointment for my mum to see an internist on 8 Feb evening (19.00-21.00). My mum has had trouble with her urination and we are looking for a second opinion, as the internist at the Dr. Suwondo Hospital in Kendal didn't give any satisfying advice. The appointment was confirmed almost immediately, the front staff and nurses were very friendly. However, it turned out the doctor was not able to come in the end, due to his family matters. What a big disappointment since we'd come a rather long way from Kendal to Semarang. Hopefully it was not because my mum was the only patient that evening. The nurses offered us to see a general practicioner instead. But no thanks...we're already disappointed. Doctors, please be more considerate in the future.

name: janet ariella
review: Doctors are very friendly towards the patients. All the staffs coordinate very well. Hospital was clean and tidy. All of them was so helpful in our need. Last but not least, the Director is very kind. üòâüëç

name: Hey GD!
review: (Translated by Google) In my opinion, Siloam Hospital's services are good, because it makes it easy for customers to help carry out Rapid Tests, both antigens and 24-hour swabs. Because it makes it easier for customers when they have to complete the terms and conditions to take transportation either by plane or train with a note that they have enough time so that when the results come out, customers can still enjoy traveling by plane or train calmly and safely without experiencing delays. Maybe some services need to be reworked, especially since this is a big hospital, starting from the front desk, security, and other services to become an evaluation material for improvements, so that customers have more confidence and give good and positive reviews in the future. In order to improve the service excellence (Original) Menurut saya services RS Siloam baik, karena memberi kemudaham bagi customer dalam membantu untuk melakukan Rapid Test baik itu antigen maupun swab 24 jam. Karena memudahkan customer ketika harus melengkapi syarat dan ketentuan utk naik transportasi baik Pesawat maupun Kereta Api dg catatan memiliki waktu cukup sehingga saat hasil keluar, customer tetap bisa menikmati perjalanan dg pesawat maupun Kereta Api dg tenang dan aman tanpa mengalami keterlambatan. Mungkin beberapa pelayanan perlu dibenahi kembali apalagi ini RS besar, mulai dari front desk, security, dan layanan lainnya utk menjadi bahan evaluasi perbaikan, agar customer lebih percaya dan memberikan ulasan yg baik dan positif kedepannya. Agar ditingkatkan lagi Service Excellentnya

name: valbecktomchris
review: (Translated by Google) It's true that I was cheated by this hospital.. I chose an internal medicine doctor, in his profile photo the person looks young and convincing, but when he came and saw him in person... Eh, it turns out that the doctor is too old, his voice and hands are shaking.. Communication is also not connected... Please Siloam Hospital, the doctor's profile photo must be displayed up to date, not 30 years ago, so as not to mislead patients who want to choose their doctor. After all, if you are old, it can be dangerous for the patient. What is the pain, but what is being examined, so the difference can be malpractice. Luckily I'm not a surgeon, you can imagine holding a knife to dissect a patient with shaking hands like that. The patient must be stressed and afraid. (Original) Benar benar KETIPU saya sama rumah sakit ini.. Saya pilih dokter internal penyakit dalam, di foto profilnya orangnya terlihat masih muda dan meyakinkan, tapi pas datang dan ketemu langsung... Eh ternyata dokternya sudah terlalu uzur, suara dan tangannya pun gemetaran... Komunikasi juga udah gak nyambung... Tolong ya siloam hospital, foto profil dokternya harus ditampilkan yang terbaru, jangan foto 30 tahun yang lalu, sehingga jangan sampai menyesatkan pasien yang ingin memilih milih dokternya. Lagian kalo udah ketuaan, bisa membahayakan pasien. Sakitnya apa, tapi yang diperiksa apa, jadi beda bisa malpraktik. Untung bukan dokter bedah, bisa dibayangkan kalo pegang pisau membedah pasien dengan tangan gemeteran seperti itu. Pasien pasti jadi stress dan ketakutan.

name: Hanny N
review: (Translated by Google) So far, I am very satisfied to check here, the hospital is disciplined in implementing health protocols, the lift is also touchless, before entering the hospital there is a temperature measurement which is also touchless. The clerk is very helpful and friendly. I came to check at 19.30, thank God, I was served well even though the doctor's practice hours were tight. Registration of new patients is fast, the nurses are also very good, the pediatrician is very informative and communicative. For a relatively very affordable cost with maximum service. Check w / pediatrician 150k and administration only 25k. The reception area and examining room are clean and comfortable. Recommend for those who want to check at this hospital. (Original) So far sangat puas periksa disini, RS disiplin menerapkan protokol kesehatan, lift juga sudah touchless, sebelum masuk RS ada pengukuran suhu yg juga touchless. Petugas sangat helpful dan ramah. Sy datang periksa jam 19.30 alhamdulillah tetap dilayani dg baik walaupun jam praktek dokternya sudah mepet. Pendaftaran pasien baru prosesnya cepat, suster juga sangat baik, dokter spesialis anak yang sangat informatif dan komunikatif. Untuk biaya relatif sangat terjangkau dengan pelayanan yg maksimal. Periksa dg dokter spesialis anak 150k dan administrasi hanya 25k. Ruangan tunggu dan ruang periksa bersih dan nyaman. Recommend untuk yg mau periksa di RS ini.

review: (Translated by Google) At first I underestimated this hospital because at the beginning of the time when I wanted to check for a circumcision procedure, our 2 month old child was really meant to wait even though I had an appointment, then I went to the 2nd floor already waiting for the doctor to leave, because there was a sudden need, but the rs immediately apologized to the hospital us and rescheduled on the same day and it was confirmed that the doctor had arrived after that the doctor was very friendly and kind and after the procedure was completed at 19.00, midnight at 3.00 in the morning the doctor came to the house to serve our complaints and check our child, thank you for Siloam Hospital service, Dr Gerard and also Dr Agustine's wife who cares and always responds when contacted via WA üôèüôèüôè (Original) awalnya sempet underestimate sama rs ini karena awal waktu mau kontrol periksa buat tindakan khitan anak kami umur 2 bulan bner2 d buat nunggu padahal udah appointment trs ke lt 2 udah nunggu jg malah dokternya pergi dong krna ada kperluan mendadak, tapi pihak rs lgsung meminta maaf kpd kami dan membuat reschedule ulang d hr yg sama dan dikonfirmasi jg kalau dokter udah datang setelah itu dokter sangat ramah dan baik dan setelah tindakan selesai pukul 19.00, tengah malam pukul 3.00 dini hari dokter datang ke rumah untuk melayani keluhan kami dan memeriksa anak kami trimakasih buat pelayanan rs siloam, dr gerard dan jg istri dr agustine yg sudah care dan selalu merespon saat dihubungi via wa üôèüôèüôè

review: (Translated by Google) An extraordinary hospital that makes it easy. Quiet doctor visits, no queues. And affordable prices. Maybe because many don't know. Recommended poll already. (Original) Rumah sakit yg pelayanan luar biasa mempermudah. Kunjungandokter sepi tidak antri. Dan harga terjangkau. Mungkin krn banyak yg belum tau. Recomended poll dah.

name: Aditiar Adit
review: (Translated by Google) Excuse me, Doc, I want to ask, how much do you pay for the VCR test, doc? (Original) Permisi Dok mau Nanya Kalo Tes VCR bayar nya brp ya dok

name: Rizki Adityya
review: (Translated by Google) The 2-day Citi scan test has no results even though my wife needs post-operative action from the results... Asked the officer 4x a day no answer.. The call center phone is not active...üò°üò°üò° I feel sorry for my wife who is hanging, it's not clear waiting for the results of the Citi scan (Original) Test Citi scan 2 hari belum ada hasil padahal istri saya butuh tindakan pasca operasi dari hasil tersebut... Di tanyakan ke petugas 4x sehari g ada jawaban.. D telp call center nya tidak aktif...üò°üò°üò° Kasihan istri saya yg terkatung g jelas nunggu hasil Citi scan tersebut

name: Christina Ekaristia
review: (Translated by Google) Thank you very much for your help. After a long drama because I wanted to be late for G-nose at the penthouse ... And I have to mlm too. Get info on this hospital with 24-hour rapid test service. Sdh hopeless will not be rushed because the estimated result is 1 hour. Indeed, I had to beg for 1 hour not to arrive. But the officers can't promise. Still on the real estimate. I think the answer is very reasonable and professional. Because that's the procedure. And I became a risk for being late from the start when I wanted to G-nose. Even though in the end the results came out cm 10 minutes ... even the officer was halfway running and approached me to make the results. Thank you for giving me a sense of "calm" in my panicüôèüòÅ (Original) Terima kasih banyak atas bantuannya. Setelah drama panjang krn telat mau G-nose di stasiun tawang.. Dan hrs plng mlm itu jg. Dpt info RS ini dgn pelayanan rapid test 24jam. Sdh hopeless bakal g keburu krn estimasi hasilnya 1jam. Memang saya sempet mohon2 agar jgn smp 1jam. Tapi petugasnya tdk bs menjanjikan. Tetap pd estimasi yg sbnrnya. Menurut saya jawaban yg sangat wajar dan profesional. Krn memang spt itu protap nya. Dan sdh menjadi resiko atas keterlambatan saya dr awal mau G-nose. Skalipun pd akhirnya hasil keluar cm 10mntan..bahkan petugas nya smp stengah berlari nyamperin saya buat ksh hasilnya. Terima kasih sdh memberikan rasa "tenang" dalam kepanikan sayaüôèüòÅ

name: Cadett Officer
review: (Translated by Google) Not bad as a reference choice for treatment in Semarang. (Original) Lumayan sebagai referensi pilihan tempat berobat di semarang.

name: E L
review: (Translated by Google) Just for input. December 2020 swab test. Register at 13.30, wait until 19.30 to get your turn. It's not too crowded though. One of the three front clerks was unfriendly, and uninformative. I just asked what time it would be my turn so I could go eat first, but I was told to stand by constantly. Just a waste of time. Tired of coming here. Now I've had several swab tests in other places, much faster even though the queue is two/three times as crowded. And only one front officer is enough. NB: but the health workers are very friendly. The response team in reply here is also very fast. Hopefully now or in the future can be resolved. I saw that the complaints about this were not only from me. Hopefully in the future it can be improved. (Original) Sekedar utk masukan. Desember 2020 swab test. Daftar jam 13.30 nunggu sampai 19.30 baru dapat giliran. Padahal ngga rame banget juga. Satu dari tiga petugas depan tidak ramah, dan tidak informatif. Saya cuma tanya kira2 jam berapa giliran saya supaya saya bisa pergi makan dulu, tapi dgn ketus disuruh stand by terus. Buang2 waktu saja. Kapok sekali ke sini. Skrg sy sudah beberapa kali swab test di tempat lain, jauh lebih cepat padahal antrian dua/tiga kali lebih ramai. Dan petugas depannya cuma satu saja cukup. NB: tapi tenaga kesehatannya ramah2 sekali. Tim respons di reply sini juga sigap sekali. Mudah2an saat ini atau ke depannya bisa terselesaikan. Saya melihat komplain utk hal ini ternyata bukan dari saya saja. Semoga kedepannya bisa diperbaiki.

name: Ana
review: (Translated by Google) The method of taking nasopharyngeal swab samples by each nurse is different. After we are told to position our heads slightly backwards, with our eyes looking at the ceiling, the swab applicator is inserted into the nose. Even until 3/4 of the swab applicator was inserted, after that the nurse even removed the handle of the swab applicator, she said to let it sink in. We are worried if the swab applicator goes too deep because it took a long time for the swab applicator to be removed by the nurse. After that, swab and rotated it for too long and even put it deeper. It's more uncomfortable, it hurts. Closed eyes asked to open eyes. Until I say stop. too long. (Original) Cara pengambilan sampel swab nasofaring oleh setiap perawat berbeda beda. Setelah kepala kita disuruh posisi agak kebelakang sedikit, dengan mata melihat langit langit, swab applicator dimasukkan ke dalam hidung. Bahkan sampai 3/4 swab applicator dimasukkan, setelah itu perawat bahkan melepas pegangan swab applicator , katanya biar meresap. Kita jadi khawatir kalo swab applicator masuk terlalu dalam karena lumayan lama dilepas swab applicatornya oleh perawat. Setelah itu di swab dan diputar putar juga terlalu lama bahkan masih dimasukkan lebih dalam lagi. Tambah tidak nyaman, ngilua rasa nya. Mata terpejam diminta buka mata. Sampai saya bilang stop . terlalu lama.

name: margareta ayu
review: (Translated by Google) I want rapid antigen. Waiting from 16.00 to 18.35, still not being called, also the reason for waiting for the nurse. Those who want to be fast here, just a little info if the service is really bad, it's taking too long. Very sorry to test here (Original) Mau rapid antigen.Nunggu dari jam 16.00 smpe jam 18.35 masih belum dipanggil juga alasan nunggu perawat. Yang mau rapid disini sedikit info aja kalau pelayanannya payah sekali bin lama. Sangat menyesal tes disini

name: Ignatius Handoko
review: (Translated by Google) I did the PCR test.. the results were negative.. but the CT value was not listed. Even though the cost is the same, in other labs the CT value is listed. When I called, she said: indeed, if it is in Siloam, the negative result is not written down the CT value. Why is that? Only the lab knows.. Can I talk to the lab? Everyone's busy. Alrighthhhh!!!! If it is stated up front that the CT Value is not listed, it's okay.. Damn this is the lab The sampling booth is also less representative. Using a booth like an atm booth. (Original) Saya test PCR.. hasil negatif.. tapi tdk tercantum CT value. Pdhal dgn biaya sama, di lab lain dicantumkan CT value. Ketika sy telpon, kata mbaknya : memang kalau di siloam, hasil negatif tdk dituliskan CT value. Kenapa begitu? Yg tau hanya pihak lab.. Boleh sy bicara dgn pihak lab ? Sedang sibuk semua. Baiklahhhhhh !!!! Seandainya disampaikan di depan bahwa tidak tercantum CT Value, it's oke.. Parah ini lab-nya Bilik pengambilan sampel juga kurang representatif. Memakai bilik seperti bilik atm.

name: Bayu Andiqa
review: (Translated by Google) The old results came out and were not in the apk in the care to protect it, it was my job to go out of town, but this time the antigen was not in the apk, right, it's a big hospital (Original) Hasil lama keluar dan gak ada di apk di peduli lingdungi, saya itu tugas nya keluar kota,tapi baru kali antigen gak ada di apk nya,, kan rumah sakit besar

name: Annchi WenXiao
review: (Translated by Google) Be careful this is a hospital scam.. It's clear on the RT-PCR banner, next day, I did PCR from Saturday until today, Monday, I didn't send an email to the hospital, the results haven't come out yet.. what's the responsibility.. please if we go to the hospital, sick people get hurt, don't make it more difficult. .. if you can't do it right next day, don't write any banners.. just come here once, the management name is good, the service is worse than the puskesmas... (Original) Hati hati penipuan ni rumah sakit.. Jelas2 di spanduk RT-PCR next day saya PCR dari hari sabtu smpek ini hari senin ga ada di kirim email saya samperin RSpun hasil blm keluar.. mana tanggung jwbnya.. tolong ya adanya kita ke RS itu orang sakit kena musibah jgn tambah disusahkan lagi.. kalo memang tdk bisa tepat next day ga usah tulis spanduk sgala.. sekali aja kesini,nama managemenya aja bagus pelayananya lebih buruk dari puskesmas...

name: Gin Gin Ginanjar
review: (Translated by Google) Queuing for 1.5 hours for Rapid antigen.. There has been a GL from the company from last week.. Don't tell us to wait for the end -the end is not registered yet.. Same for the Rapid waiting room at the front.. Lots of mosquitoes.. We went there for rapid.. name: Heribertha Lucia
review: (Translated by Google) Siloam Hospital Semarang..The hospital which is located near Peterongan .. I was there when I wanted Rappid, for good service, friendly, and strategic location. One thing is unfortunate ... parking is difficult, there is no special place ... it is on the side of the road ... to queue, it's still outside the building ... but I still understand ... the name is a new category hospital in Semarang. I hope in the future it will improve itself to compete in service humanity. (Original) Siloam Hospital Semarang..Rumah Sakit yg terletak dkt Peterongan..aku pernah kesana waktu mau Rappid ,untuk pelayanannya baik,ramah, dan tempatnya strategis. Satu yang disayangkan...parkirnya susah gak ada tempat khusus ..adanya dipinggir jalan..untuk antri ya masih diluar gedung..tapi aku tetap memaklumi..namanya Rumah sakit kategori baru di Semarang.semoga kedepannya semakin berbenah diri untuk bersaing dlm pelayanan kemanusiaan.üôè

name: Marie Teraluminou
review: (Translated by Google) Mini Hospital Valet Parking free. Although small, it is quite comfortable, clean, neat, bright, doesn't smell like a hospital. The facilities are quite complete, there are many doctors. Not tired, dizzy, confused, because it's close to every service point. No need to walk far to every service point. If every patient makes an appointment, the atmosphere will be more exclusivity awake. The queue can also be faster. If the doctor can always be on time, the patient will be happy, there is no need to wait long. The queuing system looks like it could be improved. Staff also need to be more communicative. There are areas where the signal is difficult, it would be better if it was improved, so we wouldn't be stunned. (Original) Rumah Sakit Mini Vallet Parkir gratis. Walaupun kecil namun cukup nyaman, bersih, rapi, terang, tidak bau rumah sakit. Fasilitas cukup lengkap, dokternya banyak. Tidak capek, pusing, bingung, karena dekat ke tiap titik pelayanan. Tidak perlu berjalan jauh ke setiap titik pelayanan. Kalau setiap pasien melakukan appointment pasti suasana lebih terjaga eksklusifitasnya. Antrinya juga bisa lebih cepat. Kalau dokternya bisa senantiasa ontime pasti pasien akan senang, tidak perlu menunggu lama. Sistem antrian sepertinya bisa lebih ditingkatkan. Staf juga perlu lebih komunikatif. Ada area yang susah sinyal lebih baik kalau ditingkatkan, supaya kami tidak bengong.

name: Davy Pratama
review: (Translated by Google) I really like & match the hospital emergency services. Siloam Semarang. Even when an impromptu patient arrives at noon early in the morning, doctors and nurses are always on standby & the diagnosis and medication given are also right. The hospital looks fancy, but the cost of emergency room and medicine is still quite affordable. 2x I was served by Dr. David Gani at the ER & I am very grateful to him who really cares about his patients. Always always maintain the quality of service for the hospital. Siloam Semarang üëçüëç (Original) Saya sangat suka & cocok dengan pelayanan IGD RS. Siloam Semarang. Walau pasien dadakan datang pas Pagi buta pun, Dokter maupun perawatnya selalu standby & diagnosa maupun obat yang diberikan juga tepat. RS-nya terlihat mewah ,tapi biaya IGD maupun obat-obatan masih cukup terjangkau. 2x saya dilayani oleh dr. David Gani di IGD & saya sangat berterima kasih sama beliau yang sangat peduli sama pasiennya. Tetap selalu jaga kualitas servisnya buat RS. Siloam Semarang üëçüëç

Teguh Priyanto, Sp.KK continues to be successful doctors in the future. (Original) Pelayanan sangat baik dokter nya sangat ramah sangat mengerti pasien kalau menjelaskan Ke pasien begitu care dengan pasien, terimakasih banyak dr. name: Mega Ayunda
review: (Translated by Google) The service for the antigen test is fast, very friendly, the place is clean Cs is also responsive in providing answers via WhatsApp Thankyou siloam (Original) Pelayanan untuk test antigen cepat, ramah sekali, tempat bersih Cs nya juga cepat tanggap dalam memberikan jawaban via whatsapp Thankyou siloam

name: irawan raharjo
review: (Translated by Google) Big name RS. Siloam has been around for a long time, but only since August opened a branch in Semarang City. Congratulations on serving in the health sector for the people of Semarang! This hospital is clean and the medical, administrative, and supporting services are very helpful. The services from doctors in the ER are polite, informative, and communication with patients feels familiar. Modern health facilities and a network with hospitals. Siloam in various cities can be a plus. I personally have experienced outpatient services in the ER and blood testing laboratories. The only drawback that I feel is the car park which is quite far, especially if the rainy season will be very inconvenient. Hopefully RS. Siloam can maintain, even improve services to the people of Semarang. Happy ! (Original) Nama besar RS. Siloam sudah lama sekali terdengar, namun baru sejak Agustus membuka cabang di Kota Semarang. Selamat melayani di bidang kesehatan bagi masyarakat Semarang ! Rumah Sakit ini terhitung bersih dan pelayanan bagian medis, administrasi, dan penunjang sangat membantu. Layanan dari dokter di UGD yang sopan, informatif, serta komunikasi dengan pasien terasa familiar. Sarana kesehatan yang modern serta jaringan dengan RS. Siloam di berbagai kota dapat menjadi nilai tambah. Saya pribadi telah merasakan layanan rawat jalan di UGD dan laboratorium pemeriksaan darah. Satu-satunya kekurangan yang saya rasakan adalah sarana parkir mobil yang cukup jauh, terutama jika musim hujan akan sangat merepotkan. Semoga RS. Siloam dapat mempertahankan, bahkan meningkatkan layanan kepada masyarakat Semarang. Selamat !

name: Mr R
review: (Translated by Google) 2 weeks after the cesarean section, the wife's stitches are festering and infection, there is no solution & responsibility from the r.s other than being advised to come again as normal What a shame.. (Original) 2 minggu setelah operasi cesar , bekas jahitan istri bernanah dan infeksi , tidak ada solusi & pertanggung jwban dari r.s selain disarankan datang lagi seperti normal What a shame..

name: Handi Gunawan
review: (Translated by Google) Very unfriendly service, especially in the information/front desk. Whatsapp never responded. On the phone he said he was busy, even though I was on the phone in front of him, the person was joking with his friend without asking for information or trying to help. Even worse, the information has been sent to different email addresses (not mine) twice, while personal data has been sent to other people. If it is used by the wrong person who sent the email, do you want to be responsible? Maybe the management of Siloam's class can improve the basic manners in the front office/front liners.. (Original) Pelayanan sangat tidak ramah terutama di bagian informasi/front desk. Whatsapp tidak pernah di response. Di telfon bilangnya sibuk, padahal saya di tel di depannya orangnya lagi bercandaan sama temannya tanpa menanyakan informasi atau berusaha membantu. Bahkan lebih parahnya sudah 2 kali informasi di kirim ke alamat email yg berbeda (bukan milik saya) sedangkan itu kan data pribadi yang di kirim ke orang lain. Kalau di salah gunakan sama orang yang salah di kirim email apakah mau bertanggung jawab? Mungkin management sekelas Siloam bisa di perbaikin basic manners nya bagian front office/ front liners nya..

name: Dessy Meilina
review: (Translated by Google) My experience when treated in this hospital. Very satisfying service. The nurse is patient and painstaking in handling patients. When you enter the ER, you are immediately handled because you have an appointment, so it's faster for administrative processes, etc. The doctor and nurse are friendly. The waiting time from the ER to the room is not long. Less than 1 hour (while waiting for the room to be ready I had to do the MCU). I occupied a suite. With the validity of 1 patient bed, 1 sofabed (could be a sofa can be used as a mattress), 1 small refrigerator, 1 cabinet, 1 toilet with hot and cold water, 1 AC, 1 television, and WIFI. every nurse in the room was very communicative. Delivering the drugs to be injected and their uses. Always ask about complaints that are still felt as material for observation. Every time I pressed the bell the nurse immediately responded to the room. Like the infusion runs out, the injection part of the infusion when the medicine is entered is sick. Etc. In my experience, when I was given a rather concentrated drug through an IV in the middle of the night. I was in pain and immediately called the nurse. The nurse immediately came and comforted me, until I fell asleep. The nurse is always around while controlling the infusion whether or not it should be changed while the patient is sleeping. Likewise, doctors are very communicative and friendly to patients and families. The food at Primaya Hospital is different from the food at other hospitals. More variety and tastier. As we know, hospital food is usually not delicious, but this is different. PRIMAYA Hospital provides several menu options, we can choose which food menu we want. And here we get food rations for the patient waitstaff. I ordered a sandwich yesterday HAHA. That's a menu for those waiting for patients but I was allowed by the nutritionist to order the menu. Each meal gets 1 fruit menu and 2 snacks. Thank you, Sister Viki, whose house is Wonosobo ‚ù§Ô∏è - I hope you don't get the name wrong, hehehe so much, Thank you (Original) Pengalaman saya ketika dirawat di RS ini. Sangat memuaskan pelayanannya. Susternya sabar dan telaten menangani pasien. Ketika masuk ke IGD langsung di tangani karena sudah janjian jadi lebih cepat untuk proses administrasi dll. Dokter dan susternya ramahh. Waktu tunggu dari IGD ke ruangan tidak lama. Kurang dari 1 jam (sambil nunggu ruangan siap saya harus melakukan MCU). Saya menempati ruangan suite. Dengan valilitas 1 tempat tidur pasien, 1 sofabed (bisa jadi sofa bisa jd kasur), 1 kulkas kecil, 1 kabinet, 1 toilet dengan air panas dan dingin, 1 AC, 1 televisi, dan WIFI. setiap suster di ruangan sangat komunikatif. Menyampaikan obat yg akan disuntikan dan keguanaannya. Selalu menanyakan mengenai keluhan yg masih dirasakan sbg bahan observasi. Setiap saya memencet bel suster langsung tanggap mendatangi ruangan. Seperti infus habis, bagian suntikan infus saat dimasuki obat sakit. Dll. Sepengalaman saya, saat saya diberi obat agak pekat melalui infus di tengah malam. Saya kesakitan langsung memanggil suster. Suster langsung datang sambil menenangkan saya, sampai saya tertidur. Suster selalu keliling sambil mengontrol infus apakah masih atau sudah harus diganti ketika pasien tidur. Begitu pula dengan dokter yang sangat komunikatif dan ramah kepada pasien dan keluarga. Makanan di RS Primaya beda ya dari makanan RS lain. Lebih bervariasi dan lebih enak. Seperti yang kita tahu kalau biasanya makanan RS ga enak, tapi ini beda. RS PRIMAYA memberi beberapa pilihan menu, Kita bisa memilih menu makanan yg mana yg kita mau. Dan disini kami mendapat jatah makan untuk penunggu pasien. Saya kemarin pesan sandwich HAHA. Itu menu untuk yg nunggu pasien tapi saya di izinkan oleh bagian ahli gizi untuk pesan menu tsb. Setiap makan mendapat 1 menu buah dan 2 snack. Terima kasih suster viki yang rumahnya wonosobo ‚ù§Ô∏è - semoga tidak salah nama yaa hehehe Sekian, Terima kasih.

name: THE NXT
review: (Translated by Google) Okay guys, so I will review according to what I experienced (personally). This Rs includes new, around August 2021 it seems. So the building is new. The form of the building is simple, if it's big, it's not. Condition is still clean. And zero covid patients (as of the date I reviewed) modern tools, there is a canteen too, insurance here is available except BPJS as far as I know it's not working here (information as of today from the nurse) Remember the health protocol, guys, greetings, always healthy and always successful, hopefully This pandemic will be over soon (Original) Oke gais , jd sy akan review sesuai yg saya alami ya (pribadi) . Rs ini termasuk baru , sekitar agustus taun 2021 sepertinya. Jadi bangunan nya baru. Bentuk bangunan simple kalau di kata besar ya nggak juga. Kondisi masih bersih . Dan Nol pasien covid (per tanggal saya review) alat alat modern , ada kantin juga , asuransi disini sudah bisa kecuali BPJS setau saya belum jalan disini (info per hari ini dari pihak susternya) ingatlah protokol kesehatan ya gaes salam sehat selalu dan sukses selaluu semoga pandemi ini segera selesai

Success, keep going and hopefully always survive with the best service. Thank you Primaya Hospital üòä (Original) Rumah sakit rasa hotel üòÅ Pengalman melahirkan disini seneng bgt. name: Arie Arifah
review: (Translated by Google) Last week, Grandfather had surgery at Primaya Hospital, Semarang, the treatment was fast and very good. Starting from the registration officer, the nurses, the cleaning staff, the nutrition officer, security, and the doctor, they are also very good. The place is nice, clean, spacious too. And what I like about us as a family is that the grandparents' condition is explained, what the purpose of the action is, what the drugs will be given for what purpose, everything is explained in detail. And now grandparents are healthy, thank you Primaya Hospital Semarang. (Original) Minggu kemarin eyang habis operasi di RS Primaya Semarang, penangannya cepat dan bagus banget. Selama periksa dan menjalani perawatan disana semuanya memberikan pelayanan yang baik dan super ramah. Mulai dari petugas pendaftarannya, perawat-perawatnya, petugas yang bersih-bersih, petugas gizi, security, dan dokternya jg baik banget. Tempatnya bagus, bersih, luas juga. Dan yang aku suka kita sebagai keluarga benar-benar dijelasin kondisi eyang, tindakan yang mau dilakuin tujuannya untuk apa, obat-obat yang akan diberikan gunanya untuk apa, semuanya dijelaskan secara detail. Dan sekarang eyang sudah sehat, terimakasih RS Primaya Semarang.

name: Bondan Winar
review: (Translated by Google) A modern private hospital in the growth area of ‚Äã‚ÄãSemarang City, namely Kedungmundu and not far from where I live. Not far next door is the Muhammadiyah Dental and Oral Hospital, KRT Wongsonegoro Hospital, Semarang City. Then a little towards Sambiroto there are Stikes and the Health Academy. In the future, it is suitable if the Kedungmundu area becomes a center for health services in the city of Semarang. (Original) RS swasta modern di kawasan pertumbuhan Kota Semarang, yaitu Kedungmundu dan tidak jauh dari tempat tinggal saya. Semakin menambah ramai fasilitas kesehatan dan kampus-kampus jurusan kesehatan di kawasan ini. Berada di sebelah Universitas Muhammadiyah Semarang dengan Fakultas Kedokteran dan jurusan-jurusan Kesehatan lainnya. Tidak jauh disebelahnya ada RS Gigi dan Mulut Muhammadiyah, RSUD KRT Wongsonegoro Kota Semarang. Kemudian sedikit ke arah Sambiroto ada Stikes dan Akademi Kesehatan. Kedepan cocok jika Kawasan Kedungmundu menjadi sentra pelayanan kesehatan di Kota Semarang.

review: (Translated by Google) The hospital is good, even though the parking area is narrow. But for the service, it's good. His doctor is nimble, nurses and other paramedics, quite friendly. The hospital has many patients from nearby residents, but from other regions, also came, so it is very helpful for residents of the surrounding area. With the presence of this hospital, Banyumanik residents, do not have to go far, when treated. (Original) Rumah Sakit baik, meski area parkir sempit. Namun untuk pelayanannya, bagus. Dokternya cekatan, perawat dan paramedis yang lain, cukup ramah. Bagusnya lagi, pasien dengan kartu BPJS, diutamakan dan dilayani seperti pasien umum yang bayar sendiri. Jadi tidak dibedakan. RS ini banyak pasien dari warga sekitar, namun dari lain wilayah, juga ikut datang, sehingga sangat membantu warga daerah sekitar. Dengan hadirnya RS ini, warga Banyumanik, tidak usah jauh, bila berobat.

name: Dewi Kesya
review: (Translated by Google) 2x control here, the price is good but according to the service, the doctor is also good, not in a hurry, explains very clearly and can document the ultrasound results, which can be sent via email (Original) UDa 2x kontrol d sni hrg lumayan tp sesuai pelayanan ny bgus dr ny juga ngk buru2 ,ngejelasin dgn sgt jelas dn dpt dokumentasi hasil usg d kirim melalui email

name: Ade Syah Lubis
review: (Translated by Google) I am the parent of a 5-day-old newborn with a high bilirubin condition. This hospital is the only one from my search results that allows my wife and I to visit the baby, have private time with the baby every 3 hours during his phototherapy break. Being separated from a new born child is a tough thing and it turns out that only this hospital really understands that feeling. In fact, we were loaned an empty room with a comfortable mattress and air conditioner for my wife to breastfeed and I missed my longing. A hospital that is indeed old school in furniture but covered with extraordinary service and value parenting displayed by all its staff. From security, admin, nurse to doctor. If only I had known from the start, I would have given birth to my child here too. Highly recommended for all parents! Thank you for taking good care of my child.. (Original) Saya parent dari newborn umur 5 hari dengan kondisi bilirubin tinggi. Rumah sakit ini satu-satunya dari hasil pencarian saya yang memperbolehkan saya dan istri untuk mengunjungi bayi, memiliki private time bersama bayi setiap 3 jam dalam break fototerapi nya. Terpisah dari anak yang baru saja lahir merupakan hal yang berat dan ternyata hanya rumah sakit ini yang benar-benar paham dengan perasaan tersebut. Bahkan kami di pinjamkan ruangan kosong dengan kasur dan AC yang nyaman bagi istri untuk menyusui dan saya melepas rindu. Rumah sakit yang memang jadul secara furnitur tapi tertutupi dengan layanan luar biasa dan value parenting yang ditampilkan seluruh staffnya. Dari security, admin, perawat hingga dokter. Andaikan tahu dari awal, saya bakal lahiran anak saya disini juga. Sangat recommended untuk seluruh parents! Terima kasih telah merawat anak saya dengan baik..

name: S. Prabowo
review: (Translated by Google) just now my child fell in front of the entrance because my babysitter who was carrying the baby was asked for an ID card. Even though last night my wife and nanny had swab. then in the morning the operation and we went to buy baby needs. when I came back I brought quite a lot of things, my babysitter carried my child plus a bag. our names, rooms and identities have been verified. even my babysitter was asked for an ID card which caused my child to fall. we are in the rose room. satisfied with the service even though it cost more than 35 million. We also have no complaints with the service here. but the front office system is very disappointing regardless of the eyes and feelings. only with SOP. Indiscriminately as tired as we are trying to carry goods, we are still asked for an ID card. (Original) barusan anak saya terjatuh didepan pintu masuk gara gara pengasuh anak saya yg lagi gendong bayi malah dimintai KTP. Padahal tadi malam saya istri dan pengasuh sudah swab. lalu paginya operasi dan kami pergi beli kebutuhan bayi. pas balik saya bawa barang cukup banyak, pengasuh anak saya gendong anak saya plus bawa tas. sudah diverifikasi nama, kamar dan identitas kami. malah pengasuh anak saya dimintai KTP yg mengakibatkan anak saya jatuh. kami ada dikamar mawar. puas dgn pelayannya walau menghabiskan biaya diatas 35jt. kami jg tidak ada keluhan dgn layanan disini. tapi sistem front office sangat mengecewakan tanpa melihat pakai mata dan perasaan. hanya bermodalkan SOP. tidak pandang bulu seberala capek dan usahnya kami vawa barang tetap dimintai KTP.

name: Bahar Haq
review: (Translated by Google) MONDAY, 05/03/2018 my wife experienced birth signs, I immediately brought her here at 05.30 WIB. The service is very friendly, comes without using an identity, just says if you have a collaboration with the office (mentioning the employee's NIK) they are served immediately and asked to choose a place/room I chose a class 1B room with the following facilities: - patient & waiting bed - en suite bathroom - welcome snack (2 bottles of mineral water + 5 oranges) - tv, ac, wifi, dining table, etc. Ratings: - cleanliness 9.5/10 - service 9.5/10 - comfort 9/10 Over all very good, thank you RSIA BUNDA, female doctor & team, hopefully they can maintain good service (Original) SENIN, 05/03/2018 istri mengalami tanda¬≤ kelahiran, langsung saya bawa ke sini pukul 05.30 WIB. Pelayanannya sangat ramah, datang tanpa menggunakan identitas hanya bilang kalau punya kerja sama dengan kantor (menyebutkan NIK karyawan) langsung di layani dan diminta memilih tempat/kamar Saya memilih kamar kelas 1B dengan fasilitas diantaranya : - bed pasien & penunggu - kamar mandi dalam - welcome snack (air mineral 2 botol + buah jeruk 5 buah) - tv, ac, wifi, meja makan, dll. Rating : - kebersihan 9,5/10 - pelayanan 9,5/10 - kenyamanan 9/10 Over all sangat bagus, terimakasih RSIA BUNDA, dokter putri & tim semoga dapat mempertahankan pelayanan dengan baik

review: (Translated by Google) Prices won't lie... Good service. (Original) Harga tidak akan berdusta... pelayanan Bagus.

name: Sandhy Andamari
review: (Translated by Google) From 8 weeks of pregnancy to 37 weeks, always check here with Dr. Raised üòç He is patient and very kind. Every check-up is always explained and heart problems are always relieved by consulting with him. He also really appreciated me who chose to have a cesarean even though there was no indication for his son, I chose Dr Dimas because he was the youngest of all the children. Both doctors are very good in carrying out their duties. From the beginning when I came to the hospital, I was always greeted by friendly security guards. Likewise with the receptionist and assessment. During the meeting here, the food is delicious, CS is also very polite if you will clean the room. Rooms are always clean every day. (Original) Dari kehamilan 8mgg smpai 37 mgg selalu priksa kesini sama dr besari üòç Beliau sabar dan baik banget. Setiap priksa selalu dijelasin dan keganjalan hatipun selalu terlegakan stiap konsult dg beliau. Beliaupun sangat menghargai saya yg lbh memilih untuk sesar meskipun tanpa indikasi üëå untuk dr anaknya , aku pilih dr dimas krna beliau termuda dr semua dr anak yg ada. Kedua dokter tsb sangat baik dalam melaksanakan tugasnya. Dari awal dtg ke RS selalu disambut oleh bpk2 satpam yg ramah. Begitupun dg bagian receptionist dan assasment. Selama ranap disinipun makanan enak2 , CS jg sangat sopan jk akan membersihkan kamar. Kamar selalu bersih setiap harinya.

name: Humairoh Aliyah
review: (Translated by Google) Expensive, that's for sure. Have you checked several times, still asking what date of HPHT, what date of HPL, what drugs have been given, are there no medical records on the computer? Doctor's registration and practice at the front, but considering the tension behind, it's a bit further away, still being asked for a long time. Sometimes at the same time the officers chat with one another. Then the parking is not wide enough. Often moved mblnya. There was a relative waiting in the car, knocking and knocking on the mbl window, blg wanted to be moved in the mbl. All complicated. (Original) Mahal, sudah pasti. Sudah periksa bbrp kali, tetap saja di tanya HPHT tgl brp, HPL tgl brp, obat yg sudah di berikan apa saja, apa tidak ada rekam medis di komputer nya? Pendaftaran dan praktek dokter di depan, tapi timbang tensi di belakang, agak jauh lagi, masih di tanya2 lama sekali. Kadang di sambi ngobrol petugas satu dengan yg lain. Terus parkirnya kurang luas. Sering di pindah2 mblnya. Ada saudara ikut menunggu di mobil, di ketok2 terus kaca mbl, blg mau di pindah dl mblnya. Serba ribet.

name: indra rachmadi
review: (Translated by Google) I still remember the experience of giving birth at the Mother Hospital for the 2nd child in May 2019, which was less pleasant in terms of service, especially information related to costs that were not clear without being confirmed first and the actions of the midwife in the delivery room that seemed to be frightening for the C-Section and few signs. hand statement letter (I forgot the Midwife's name). Now giving birth to my 3rd child to another hospital which is better in terms of service at relatively the same price because of the trauma to go to the Mother Hospital again. 2 years have passed, I hope that in 2021 it will change for the better in terms of service so that it is more blessed and does not seem profit oriented but service is not comparable. (Original) Saya masih selalu ingat pengalaman melahirkan di RS Bunda anak ke 2 bulan Mei 2019 yang kurang menyenangkan dari sisi pelayanan, khususnya informasi terkait biaya yang tidak jelas tanpa di konfirmasikan dulu dan tindakan Bidan di ruang bersalin yang terkesan menakut nakuti untuk C-Section dan dikit2 tanda tangan surat pernyataan (Saya lupa nama Bidan itu). Sekarang melahirkan anak ke 3 saya ke RS lain yang lebih bagus secara pelayanan dengan harga yang relatif sama karena trauma untuk ke RS Bunda lagi. 2 tahun berlalu semoga tahun 2021 ini berubah lebih baik secara pelayanan agar lebih berkah dan tidak terkesan profit oriented tapi pelayanan tidak sebanding.

name: Rina Wida
review: (Translated by Google) Have given birth 4 times here with dr. Putri, the hospital is very homey, the food is delicious, the nurses & midwives are also kind & friendly. The service is also getting better from year to year. If you want control here, register long beforehand, so you can get the initial queue number, especially those from outside the city, so you don't wait too long. (Original) Sudah 4x melahirkan disini dengan dr. Putri, RSnya homey banget, masakannya enak2, perawat & bidan juga baik & ramah. Pelayanan juga semakin baik dari tahun ke tahun. Kalo mau kontrol disini, daftar dulu jauh2 hari sebelumnya, agar dapat nomor antrian awal, apalagi yg dari luar kota, biar ga kelamaan nunggu.

name: Aris Syanto
review: (Translated by Google) This is an old hospital that used to specialize in eye treatment. As soon as you enter the gate, you will immediately see that this hospital is a relic of the past. Oh yes, here in addition to general treatment, it also serves BPJS patients. Most of the staff are friendly, from security guards to doctors. The suggestion for improvement is that the toilet in front of the Agatha room will be paid more attention so that the smell does not spread. Other improvements are so that visitors and patients do not pass through the emergency room because they are at risk of being exposed. Also, multiply the trash cans along the aisles. (Original) Ini merupakan rumah sakit lama yang dulu khusus pengobatan mata. Begitu memasuki gerbangnya langsung tampak kalo rumah sakit ini peninggalan jaman dulu. Oh ya, di sini selain pengobatan umum juga melayani pasien bpjs. Petugasnya sebagian besar ramah¬≤, mulai dari satpam hingga dokter. Usul perbaikan semoga toilet di depan ruang agatha agar lebih diperhatikan sehingga baunya tidak menyebar. Perbaikan lainnya agar pengunjung dan pasien tidak melewati igd karena riskan terpapar. Dan juga, perbanyak tempat sampah di sepanjang lorong.

name: Berdi Simangulun
review: (Translated by Google) The experience of giving birth here on Sunday 10 10 2021. The emergency room entry service is very fast, no queuing, fast admin no queuing, BPJS can go to class. In the delivery room served quickly by nurses. Sewing is fast. There is no time left behind like in Hermina before. Class 1 rooms are also nice, clean and spacious. The most caring Rs in Semarang. The nurses are responsive and friendly. (Original) Pengalaman melahirkan di sini di hari minggu 10 10 2021. Pelayanan masuk IGD sangat cepat ditangani tidak antri, adm cpat tdk antri, BPJS bs naik kelas. Di ruang bersalin dilayani cepat oleh suster2. Jahit pun cepat. Tidak ada waktu ditelantarkan sperti di Hermina dulu. Kamar kelas 1 pun bagus bersih dn luas. Rs ter-care se semarang. Perawat2nya cepat tanggap dn ramah.

name: puji sutrisno
review: (Translated by Google) A house for better health, always improving, from eye-specific to general. I hope to be a health service for the general public which is always getting better. (Original) Rumah untuk sehat yg semakin baik, selalu berbenah, dari khusus mata menjadi umum. Semoga menjadi pelayan kesehatan bagi masyarat umum yg selalu meningkat lebih baik.

name: suronoe ronoe
review: (Translated by Google) Last month it was pivoted and got a queue number for further control, it turned out that after pivoting, I was told to queue again to print paper (it took a long time), even though the pivot time last month was also a long queue. After printing the paper, you have to ask to queue again at the poly, the doctor is also not on time so it takes too long. In my opinion, please follow up to make it simpler. I feel sorry for my mom when I checked there, the wait was long. indent (long queue) ~ print paper (long queue) ~ wait for the doctor (long queue) ~ drug queue (long queue) Second: I have taken queue number A but was given queue number C by the guard on duty but it turned out that the queue was wrong, I already said that I was checking into a new poly. the mothers who take care are told that they are even annoying!! The number I took A was asked by Ibux who was in charge. Fortunately, the clerk at the registration was fine, it's okay to take the wrong queue and still be served. (Original) Bulan lalu sudah inden dan dapat nomor antrian untuk kontrol selanjutx, ternyata setelah inden disuruh untuk antri lagi untuk mencetak kertas (memakan waktu yg lama), padahal waktu inden bulan lalu juga sdh antri lama. Setelah cetak kertas hrs suruh ngantri lagi ke poli, dokter juga tidak tepat waktu jadi terlalu lama. menurut saya mohon ditindaklanjuti untuk dibuat lebih simple. Saya kasian dengan mama sy klu periksa disitu nungguny lama. inden (antri lama) ~ cetak kertas (antri lama) ~ nunggu dokterx (antri lama) ~ antri obat (antri lama) Kedua: Saya sdh ambil nmr antrian A tapi dikasih nomor antrian C oleh petugas yg jaga tapi ternyata antriannya salah, saya udah bilang kalau saya pemeriksaan ke poli baru. ibu-ibu yg jaga dikasih tau malah ngeyel!! Nomor yg sy ambil A diminta sm ibux yg jaga. Untung petugas di pendaftaran baik tdk apa2 ambil antrian salah tetap dilayani.

name: Sartika Ayu Adipura Supratin
review: (Translated by Google) Born here. The service is really good even though it's a BPJS patient. When you enter the ER, you are greeted quickly and in a friendly manner. Enter the delivery room, which is comfortable and the midwife is very kind. Assisted until D + 1 was born, taught how to carry, mimic, and bathe. Manjiw, steady soulüëç (Original) Habis lahiran disini. Pelayanannya baik banget meski pasien bpjs. Masuk IGD disambut gesit dan ramah. Masuk ruang bersalin yg nyaman dan bidannya baik baik bangetttttt. Dibantu sampe H+1 lahiran, diajarin cara gendong, mimik, dan mandiin. Manjiw mantap jiwaüëçüèº

name: Nurul Rahma
review: (Translated by Google) The hospital is easily accessible by vehicle. The staff is friendly to serve. In addition, outpatients can book check-ups online via WA well in advance. After registering, patients can come according to the selected day and time. Doctor Yuli is quite clear in explaining to patients. (Original) Rumah sakit mudah terjangkau kendaraan. Para petugas dengan ramah melayani. Selain itu, pasien rawat jalan bisa booking periksa online melalui WA jauh-jauh hari sebelumnya. Setelah daftar, pasien bisa datang sesuai hari dan jam yang dipilih. Dokter Yuli cukup jelas dalam menjelaskan kepada pasien.

name: Mhmd Sntia
review: (Translated by Google) For service, I am very satisfied with the service. review: (Translated by Google) If you want to give birth here, you better think twice, in my experience as a mother, I can't wait for a child to give birth, even after giving birth I can't wait for my own child instead of her husband, it's strict, it's strict, but the rules are surveyed again, cooking moms can't wait for their child I want to give birth myself.. a little note when using public, not bpjs (Original) Kalau mau melahirkan disini mending mikir 2x,pengalaman saya sebagai ibu,mau nungguin anak lahiran gak boleh,setelah lahiran pun mau nungguin anak sendiri gantian sm suaminya jg gak boleh,üò†ketat ya ketat,tp peraturan disurvey lg,masak ibu gak boleh nungguin anaknya sendiri yg mau melahirkan..sedikit catatan kt pake umum bukan bpjs

name: tika oktaviani
review: (Translated by Google) One of the referral hospitals in the city of Semarang, the place is at the corner of the highway, be careful when turning to the entrance, because there is a lot of traffic, and sometimes from above the road is fast, parking is 2 thousand for the first 1 hour and adds up a thousand for the next, after entering the registration counter, the queue is quite long, yes, you have to be patient or arrive one hour earlier than schedule if for example you want to check, the service queue is in accordance with the queue queue, so the earlier the service is faster, after checking you should immediately collect the recipe and take the queue at the counter for pivot for control, (Original) Salah satu rumah sakit rujukan di kota Semarang, tempatnya di tikungan jalan raya, hati - hati kalo pas belok ke pintu masuk, soalnya rame lalu lintas, dan kadang dari arah atas suka kenceng - kenceng jalannya, parkirnya 2 rb untuk 1 jam pertama dan nambah seribu untuk berikutnya, setelah masuk ke loket pendaftaran Antrian lumayan lama ya, harus sabar atau datang lebih awal satu jam dari jadwal kalo misal mau periksa, antrian pelayanan sesuai dengan antrian loket, jadi semakin awal semakin cepat dilayani, setelah periksa sebaiknya langsung kumpulkan resep dan ambil antrian di loket buat inden buat kontrol,

review: (Translated by Google) Have visited both William Rs, the place is nice clean, every place has hand washing liquid, the only thing that is lacking is just parking which is not wide enough, still like uyel uyelanüôè (Original) Pernah berkunjung k rs william both, tempatnya bagus bersih, setiap tempat ada cairan pencuci tangan, yg d kurang cuma parkiran aja yg kurang luas, masih suka uyel uyelanüôè

review: (Translated by Google) Sick mother, good service, it's a shame if the night light is lacking, other than that everything is very good (Original) Ibu yang sakit, pelayanan bagus,sayang kalau malam penerangan kurang, lain dari itu semua sangat baik

name: wahyuni fitriariani
review: (Translated by Google) I don't know about this hospital anymore. There is an official website but it doesn't update, online registration via WA is slow, the response is severe, even until finally I registered directly to the hospital and got the queue number for the specialist poly, suddenly the doctor was on leave. Without prior notification to the patient. Free indent list! Please, fix the administrative system. If you are on leave, don't take the patient. Do you think that a patient who has tried so hard to endure pain and has to come back empty-handed??! Serious hospital!!! (Original) Gak ngerti lagi sama RS ini. name: Neni Wardana
review: (Translated by Google) Been here several times to accompany my mother to check her ears and eyes (at different times) because it is a referral from health facility 1. Access to the location is easy but it is located at the right turn so you have to be more careful when turning to the hospital. Car parking is a bit difficult and space is limited. The waiter was good, even though my mother used Bpjs but still served well and friendly. Retrieval of queue numbers is also facilitated through Whatsapp chat so that you can immediately queue at the destination poly. The staff is friendly, kind and informative. There is a canteen and ATM near the gate and several small food canteens near the visitor's door. (Original) Beberapa kali kesini untuk menemani ibu periksa telinga dan mata (dalam waktu yang berbeda) karena merupakan rujukan dari faskes 1. Akses ke lokasi mudah namun letaknya yang tepat dibelokan jadi harus lebih barhati-hati saat belok ke RS. Parkiran mobil agak sulit dan tempat terbatas. Pelayan bagus, walaupun ibu saya memakai Bpjs namun tetap dilayani dengan baik dan ramah. Pengambilan nomer antrian juga dimudahkan melalui chat Whatsapp sehingga bisa langsung mengantri ke poli yang dituju. Staff ramah, baik dan informatif. Ada kantin dan ATM di dekat pintu gerbang dan beberapa kantin makanan kecil di dekat pintu pengunjung.

name: Sheila Riany
review: (Translated by Google) Respect for William Booth Hospital, the service is very good & friendly. There were never any problems during outpatient treatment. name: Caraka Mahardika
review: (Translated by Google) Departing from home at 4 in the morning with unhealthy conditions, intending to get a queue number of specialists in the morning. Is this the specialist who is asking for an impromptu leave or a hospital with no updated doctor leave? If I found out the day before that the doctor I was going to today is on leave, then I asked for a referral letter to another hospital with a specialist in the morning. Finally, what should the referral letter do? Requesting a new referral letter with the same specialist is not permitted and the printed reference letter is valid for 3 months. Friday December 13 2019. (Original) Berangkat dari rumah jam 4 pagi dengan kondisi tidak sehat, bermaksud agar dapat nomor antrian dokter spesialis penyakit dalam pagi. Sehari sebelumnya saya cek di website RS Wiliiam Booth tidak ada informasi bahwa dokter spesialis yang saya tuju mau cuti, bahkan dokter spesialis yang sama yang mau cuti sudah ada infonya jauh2 hari sebelumnya, sehari sebelumnya pun dan sebelum minta surat rujukan, saya telp rumah sakit ini juga tidak ada informasi dokter spesialis yang saya tuju mau cuti. Ini dokter spesialisnya yang minta cuti dadakan atau rumah sakitnya yang tidak ada update dokter yang cuti? JiKalau saya mengetahui sehari sebelumnya bahwa dokter yang saya tuju hari ini cuti, maka saya minta surat rujukan ke rumah sakit lain yang ada dokter spesialis penyakit dalam pagi. name: Adji Cynthia
review: Plus sides: - Great hospitality from staffs, securities, nurses and doctors. - Affordable. - Not a creepy hospital. - Cleaning team is coming twice a day to pick up trash, sweep and mop the floor. - Clean bathroom and bedroom, functioning water heater, refrigerator and air conditioner. - Fresh air in the morning. Minus sides: - Far from everything. You have to go outside the campus yourself to have something to eat. Online food delivery is easy but they don‚Äôt have too many options for food. The nearest restaurant is a kilometer away. - Very small TV, never use it since the signal is bad too. I almost give 5 star for this hospital, but sadly I have to lower the point. This hospital was opened 5 years ago, but up until now you have to pay all with cash, like HARD CASH, they don‚Äôt have any means for an online transaction using debit or credit card. The only ATM inside the building is BTN, so yeah, it‚Äôs quite sad.

name: Bondan Winar
review: (Translated by Google) The atmosphere is still fresh and calm. I deliberately did not discuss the hospital services because honestly I have never been to the hospital. name: Viva Rosiyana
review: (Translated by Google) Security guard is friendly, kind and not arrogant Maybe you come late, until the hospital at 08.50 take a quick queue number. Waited at the eye polyclinic for a long time because he was only called at 12 o'clock, and the action was 12 o'clock. Go down to pharmacy. The queue from 12.30 to 13.55 has still not been called. Still waiting for 10 queue numbers. I came to queue number F070 (12.30 hours) now F093 (13.55) the difference is 23 numbers and it took 1.5 hours. This search for a cure exceeds the search for the scriptures. I know that prescribing medicine requires precision, but is this thoroughness or searching on google first? It's not logical for long. In my opinion, the fatmasi officer is very lacking. Pharmacies that are ready ¬± 5 people, while hundreds of patients. It's been inhumane for a long time, which hospital has its own 2-hour queue, won't the patients get sicker like this? (Original) Satpam ramah, baik hati dan tidak sombong Mungkin datangnya kesiangan, sampai RS jam 08.50 ambil nomor antrian cepat. Nunghu di poli mata cukup lama karna baru dipanggil jam set.12 an, dan tindakan jam 12an. Turun ke bagian farmasi. Antrian dri jam 12.30 sampai detik ini 13.55 masih belum dipanggil. Masih menunggu 10 nomor antrian. Saya datang nomor antrian F070 (jam 12.30) sekarang batu F093 (13.55) selisih 23 nomor menghabiskan 1,5 jam. Ini nyari obat ngelebihin pencarian kitab suci. Saya tau meresep obat butuh ketelitian, tapi ini ketelitian atau searcing dulu di google sih? Gak logis lamanya. Menjrut saya petugas fatmasinya sangat kurang. Farmasi yg ready ¬±5 orang, sedangkan pasien ratusan. Ini lamanya udah gak manusiawi sih, RS mana yg ngantrinya 2 jam sendiri, apa gak makin sakit pasiennya klo gini.

name: Nur An Nisaa
review: (Translated by Google) The antigen service is very fast. I've been here twice with different types of payments. For the first antigen with online registration and transfer. The second antigen comes directly with cash payments. For cash, the registration process is to the IGD first, then enter the lobby in the middle of making payments at the BTN cashier. Then go back to the ER registration to take the file, then go to the swab collection location in front of the TB Poly. The total duration of service from the initial registration until the antigen results came out did not reach 30 minutes. Very fast. Then there is no queue either. And don't have to wait long for a swab. thank you (Original) Pelayanan antigennya cepat sekali. Sudah dua kali antigen disini dengan jenis pembayaran yg berbeda. Untuk antigen pertama dengan daftar online dan transfer. Antigen kedua dengan langsung datang pembayaran cash. Kalo utk cash alurnya pendaftaran ke IGD dulu, terus masuk ke lobby tengah pembayaran di Kasir BTN. Trus balik lagi ke pendaftaran IGD utk ambil berkas, baru ke lokasi pengambilan swab di depan Poli TB. Total durasi pelayanan dari awal pendaftaran sampai hasil antigen keluar ngga nyampe 30 menit. Cepet bgt. Terus ngga ada antrian juga. Dan ngga nunggu lama utk di swab. Terima kasih

name: Risky Gelar Maliq
review: (Translated by Google) Children after birth are cared for here, the nurses in the NICU are very friendly and supportive, 2 children are looked after by 1-2 nurses. Good communication between Dr on duty and Dr specialist for decision making. The Dr specialist is very experienced because of his long practice at Karyadi for newborns or neonates. Because at the RSND, thank God, the efforts that were made were permitted by God to recover my newborn child with pneumonia. Bismillah RSND, if there are many visitors, they will develop well and there is no need for everyone to refer to Karyadi, who has too many patients. (Original) Anak setelah lahir dirawat disini, perawat di ruang NICU sangat ramah dan supportive, 2 anak dijaga oleh 1- 2 perawat. Komunikasi yang baik antara Dr jaga dengan Dr specialist untuk pengambilan keputusan. Dr specialist nya sangat berpengalaman karena lama praktek di karyadi untuk bayi baru lahir atau neonatonus. Karena di RSND, alhamdulillah ikhtiar yang di lakukan diizinkan oleh Allah untuk sembuh anak saya yang baru lahir dengan kondisi pneumonia. Bismillah RSND kalau ramai pengunjung akan berkembang dengan baik dan tidak perlu semuanya rujuk ke Karyadi yang pasiennya sudah terlalu banyak.

review: (Translated by Google) One of the hospitals in the city of Semarang. A quite comfortable place with adequate facilities too. Located in the Diponegoro University complex in Semarang and become an integral part of this University. Clean place, spacious parking. Friendly, alert and professional service. This hospital is also often used as a reference for BPJS users (Original) Salah satu rumah sakit ki kota Semarang. Tempat yang cukup nyaman dengan fasilitas yang cukup memadahi juga. Berada dalam komplek Universitas Diponegoro Semarang dan menjadi satu kesatuan dari Universitas ini. Tempat bersih, parkir luas. Pelayanan ramah, sigap dan profesional. Rumah sakit ini juga sering dijadikan rujukan untuk pasien pengguna BPJS

name: Endah Nuraeni
review: (Translated by Google) ER: critical patients were sent home.. (if it's not really bad, don't come here #what the emergency room staff say) Outpatient polyclinic: there is no genuine specialist. almost all undip fk students who checked (coas/resident).. Want to consul with someone who doesn't understand? The patient's disease problem is privacy, not all can understand, understand / competent and have no empathy... Wrong practice and untrustworthy. Unprofessional service. There is no dpjp responsibility. Forged signature. Registration bag: asked to register for a booking, didn't want to and was not friendly. Pharmacy department: dispensing old manufacturer's drugs (even though there are not that many patient queues) you can take a prescription the next day. Not all drugs are available.. and not all can be covered by BPJS.. Facilities like type C in general. The ct scan tool is broken. The first one to look for a laboratory/radiology, there is no direction to indicate the location (confusing). Very bad service. (Original) IGD : pasien gawat disuruh pulang.. (kalo gak parah banget jangan kesini #perkataan staf igd) Dipoli rawat jalan : gak ada dokter spesialis yang asli. hampir semua mahasiswa fk undip yang periksa (coas/residen).. Mau konsul dengan orang yang gak paham? Masalah penyakit pasien itu privasi gak semua bisa paham, ngerti /kompeten dan tidak ada empatinya... Salah praktek dan tidak amanah . Pelayanan tidak profesional. Tanggung jawab dpjp gak ada. Tanda tangan dipalsukan. Bag pendaftaran : dimintai tolong daftar booking gakmau dan bersikap kurang ramah. Bag farmasi : meracik obat pabrikan lamaaaa (padahal antrian pasien gak begitu banyak )bisa diambil resep besoknya. Tidak semua obat tersedia.. dan tidak semua bisa dicover bpjs.. Fasilitas seperti tipe c pada umumnya. Alat ct scan rusak. Yang baru pertama cari laborat/ radiologi gada arah pentunjuk lokasi (membingungkan). Buruk bangett pelanyanannya.

name: Prio Pambudi
review: (Translated by Google) 5 stars for the security guard, very friendly and helpful. Ask for help at the general surgery poly, given a speaker to call the queue. (Original) Bintang 5 buat pak satpam, sangat ramah dan membantu. Minta tolong di poli bedah umum, dikasih speaker untuk pemanggilan antrian.

The price of physiotherapy is quite cheap, if not because Dr. Tanti only practices here, maybe I will think twice about coming here (Original) RM masih manual bikin antrian jadi makin lama.. dateng cepet sepagi apapun percuma kalo RM nya datengny telat. review: (Translated by Google) There is no place to drop non-Igd passengers, the bathroom is far away, does not obey the procedures, the outside is good but the inside is like a health center, cramped but too crowded, the queue for medicine is very long, the doctor ordered to check the lab and buy medicine for a disease that has healed for a long time, the children of Koas are too busy even though the room is very narrow, the health workers are not good at weighing babies, the registration takes a long time to be called even though there is no queue (Original) Gaada tempat drop penumpang non igd, kamar mandi jauh, tidak taat prokes, luarnya bagus tapi dalamnya kayak puskesmas, sempit tapi terlalu ramai, antri obat lama banget, dokternya menyuruh cek lab dan beli obat untuk penyakit yang sudah lama sembuh, anak koas terlalu rame padahal ruangan sempit banget, tenaga kesehatannya gak becus nimbang bayi, registrasinya lama dipanggil padahal gaada antrian

name: Isnaini puji a
review: (Translated by Google) - Pretty good. Actually, the building is big and nice, but it looks like it's already damaged, maybe the building's maintenance is lacking. - For air conditioning at the poly, pharmacy, poly waiting room, it's very cold, the advice is not to be too cold because it's a pity that the old (old) people are cold. - Nurses here vary, some are friendly, some are not. Communications. The suggestion is that all nurses should be friendly and smile, because it's a pity for patients who are old (old) who want to ask so they are afraid. - Sorry, when my mother-in-law was hospitalized for catheterization at the RSND at 10 o'clock, at 12 o'clock I couldn't have lunch, until finally I asked the nurse and it turned out they had FORGOTTEN. Finally at 13.30 my mother just got lunch. - Please improve more for the service. In the past, when my father operated at the RSND in 2019, the service was not like this, the service was better and the nurses were more friendly, smiled, and greeted him. It is hoped that RSND will be able to improve its quality and service in the future. Amen! Sorry if there are wrong words, thank youüôè (Original) - Cukup baik. Sebenernya gedungnya besar dan bagus, tp syg sudah spt rusak ya, mungkin perawatan gedungnya kurang. - Untuk AC saat di poli, farmasi, ruang tunggu poli sgt dingin sekali, saran jangan terlalu dingin karena kasihan yg sdh pada sepuh (tua) kedinginan. - Perawat disini bermacam2 ada yang ramah, ada juga yg tidak ramah. Krg komunikasi. Saran sebaiknya semua perawat harus ramah dan senyum, karena kasihan untuk pasien yg sudah sepuh (tua) mau bertanya jadi takut. - Maaf, saat ibu mertua saya rawat inap untuk kateterisasi di RSND jam 10an, jam12 tidak dapat makan siang, sampai akhirnya sy tanya ke perawatnya dan ternyata mereka LUPA. name: kartika kusuma pertiwi
review: (Translated by Google) I appreciate the officers at RSND who provide good and friendly service, from the security guard, nurses and doctors, thank God I met good people. At the pharmacy, the wait was long, at set time at 11 pm the queue being called was still F004, or maybe it was because the officers were careful in taking the drugs so they wouldn't be confused so they didn't want to rush, or it could also be preparing drugs for hospitalized patients and others. üòä. But today I called the customer service number, many times and many times and was always rejected, even though the general Cs number and Igd Cs number were different, I called the general Cs number to ask for information but was always rejected. Finally I came to the rsnd, and saw the cs officer was silent doing nothing, then playing with his cellphone and occasionally looking around and then focusing on his cellphone again, this time I was very disappointed with the customer service. Hopefully after this I can be more responsible for their services and try to understand what the main functions of cs are and how the soup is, if there is a ringing phone it should be picked up or rejected (Original) Saya mengapresiasi para petugas di rsnd yg memberikan pelayanan yg baik dan ramah, dari pak satpamnya, perawat dan dokternya alhamdulillah saya bertemu dengan yg baik baik. Di bagian farmasi memang menunggunya lama, waktu itu jam set 11 siang antrian yg dipanggil masih F004, atau mungkin saja karena petugasnya berhati2 dalam mengambil obat agar tidak tertukar jadi tidak mau terburu buru, atau bisa jadi juga menyiapkan obat untuk pasien2 di ranap dan yg lainya üòä. Tetapi hari ini saya menelpon nomor custumer service nya, berkali kali dan kali kali dan selalu direject, padahal nomor Cs umum dan Cs igd berbeda, saya menelpon di nomor Cs umum untuk menanyakan informasi tapi selalu direject. Akhirnya saya datang ke rsnd, dan melihat petugas cs nya sedang diam tidak melakukan apa2, lalu maen hape dan sesekali melihat sekitar lalu fokus ke hapenya lagi, untuk kali ini kecewa sekali dengan customer service nya. Semoga setelah ini bisa lebih bertanggungjawab lagi atas pelayananya dan mencoba memahami apa tupoksi cs dan bagaimana sop nya kalau ada telpon berdering itu harusnya diangkat atau ditolak üòÅ

name: Muhammad Arief Kurniawan
review: (Translated by Google) I'm sorry I'm no longer here, I've been getting treatment here many times, the service is very bad, plus it's tormented when you get a student who can't put infusions, the BPJS is difficult to use. review: (Translated by Google) The ENT Poly patient has to wait to stand up, because it is located in a narrow hallway opposite the Surgery Room... the seats are occupied by the family of the patient who is undergoing surgery. name: Endah Wahyani
review: (Translated by Google) Chronology: register via the application the day before, when you re-register in front of the registration counter it says the booking code is forfeited, then goes to the counter where you are given a paper receipt, he said, he will be called. I asked which obgyn clinic was shown. At this point my perception is wrong with the word "later called" in front of the clinic. After waiting 3 hours without being called (finally the doctor arrived home), I went to the counter, he said because the patient was just waiting for registration, he was shown the writing on the receipt. After 3 hours of data collection at the manual counter, pay to the cashier, then called to the clinic, the doctor has returned. I don't want to lose money either, I ask for payment from the doctor again. Input for the counter clerk, if you give information to a new patient that is CLEAR, the reason I asked when I was given the receipt was why I was not immediately given the General Consent, he said because of the queue. Even though as far as I can remember, there was no queue, only my introduction was behind it. Disappointing first experience (Original) Kronologis: daftar lewat aplikasi sehari sebelumnya, saat daftar ulang di depan loket pendaftaran katanya kode booking hangus, trus ke loket yg biasa di kasih struk kertas katanya nanti dipanggil. Saya tanya klinik obgyn sebelah mana ditunjukkan. Di titik ini persepsi saya salah kata "nanti dipanggil" di depan klinik. Setelah menunggu 3 jam tidak dipanggil (akhirnya dokter sampai sudah pulang), saya ke loket, katanya krn pasien baru nunggu di pendaftaran, ditunjukkan tulisan itu di struk. Setelah 3 jam baru didata di loket manual, bayar ke kasir, baru dipanggil ke klinik, dokter sudah pulang. Saya tidak mau rugi uang juga, pembayaran dokter saya minta balik lagi. Masukan buat petugas loket, kalo memberi keterangan ke pasien baru YANG JELAS, alasan saya tanya pada saat dikasih struk kenapa tidak langsung dikasih General Consent, katanya krn antrian. Padahal seingat saya waktu itu tidak ada antrian, di belakang hanya ada pengantar saya. Pemgalaman pertama yg bikin kecewa

name: Reny Ingemer Selvia
review: (Translated by Google) September 9 gave birth normally here. Enter IGD early in the morning using BPJS, check opening 2, given time 2 hours for observation 2 hours then still opening 2 want to open 3. Directly moved to the observation room. Alhamdulillah, you don't need to wait until opening 4 has been accepted using bpjs. The service is good. Nurses, midwives, doctors always monitor half an hour during a contraction. Recommended for those who want normal delivery here. (Original) Tgl 9 september melahirkan normal disini. Masuk IGD dini hari pakai bpjs, dicek sudah pembukaan 2, dikasih wkt 2 jam untuk observasi 2 jam kemudian masih pembukaan 2 mau ke pembukaan 3. Langsung dipindah ke kamar observasi. Alhamdulillah nggak perlu nunggu sampai pembukaan 4 sudah diterima pakai bpjs. Pelayanannya bagus. Perawat, bidan, dokter selalu memantau setengah jam sekali selama kontraksi berlangsung. Recommended bagi yang mau lahiran normal disini.

name: Hangger Putro Pangarso
review: (Translated by Google) The hospital is located in the neighborhood UNDIP, precisely located somewhat into the adjacent School of Medicine. Access to this hospital can be through the main gate or through the ring road, but if passing the ring road is very quiet when it's night. The facilities are quite complete, the service is also good. There is a Polyclinic that is active on weekdays and working hours, EDD, Laboratory and Radiology services 24 hours. Diner here it open until the afternoon, store and minimarket located quite far away, should even out UNDIP first. For visitors motorbike parking is located at the west door of the RS. (Original) Rumah sakit ini berada di lingkungan UNDIP, tepatnya berada agak masuk ke dalam disebelah Fakultas Kedokteran. Akses ke RS ini bisa lewat gerbang utama atau lewat jalan lingkar, tetapi jika lewat jalan lingkar sangat sepi jika sudah malam hari. Fasilitas cukup lengkap, pelayanannya juga bagus. Ada Poliklinik yang aktif pada hari kerja dan jam kerja, pelayanan IGD, Laboratorium dan Radiologi 24 jam. Kantin disini bukanya hingga sore, toko dan minimarket letaknya lumayan jauh, bahkan harus keluar UNDIP dulu. Untuk parkir motor pengunjung terletak di pintu barat RS.

name: ga adakok
review: (Translated by Google) Less complete. There used to be a friend in an accident here, he couldn't afford it, finally he was taken to Kariadi, there he just got healthy.
