name: Tika Syadza
review: (Translated by Google) I first checked into the RSND to check the eyes because I felt uncomfortable with old glasses besides being close to where I live. The service was good, the ophthalmologist who was on duty (dr.Riski, Sp.M) was very friendly and explained in detail so I wasn't confused because at that time minus I dropped a bit from the glasses I was wearing. And the commander on duty is also very friendly. The process of waiting for the queue is rather long but it is natural considering the series of eye examinations that must be carried out in the examination room from one step to another. (Original) saya pertama kali periksa ke RSND untuk periksa mata karena merasa tidak nyaman dengan kacamata lama selain itu dekat dengan tempat tinggal. Pelayanan bagus, dokter mata yang saat itu sedang bertugas (dr.Riski, Sp.M) sangat ramah dan menjelaskan dengan detail jadi saya tidak kebingungan karena saat itu minus saya turun agak banyak dr kacamata yg saya pakai. Dan koass yang bertugas juga sangat ramah. Proses menunggu antrian agak lama tapi itu wajar mengingat rangkaian pemeriksaan mata yang harus dilakukan di ruang pemeriksaan dari step satu ke yang lain.

name: Arif Okda Saputra
review: (Translated by Google) Services and facilities have started well. But the students who are treated are still expensive. Edit review, previously 4 star and now I change to star 2. After Lebaran 2019 I don't know why the service has become bad. The queue is long, especially in the pharmacy section when you want to take drugs, can wait for hours just for prescribing drugs. Suggestions for management of RSND please fix to service the pharmacy section so that patients and their families who take drugs can be more comfortable and don't spend time just waiting for the drug to be taken. Thanks. (Original) Pelayanan dan fasilitasnya sudah mulai bagus. Tp klu mahasiswa yg dirawat tetep aja mahal. Edit review, sebelumnya bintang 4 dan sekarang saya rubah menjadi bintang 2. Sehabis lebaran 2019 ga tau kenapa pelayanannya jadi buruk. Antriannya lama, terutama di bagian farmasi ketika hendak mengambil obat, bisa menunggu berjam-jam cuma untuk peresepan obat. Saran untuk manajemen RSND mohon di benahi untuk pelayanan dibagian farmasinya agar lebih cepat supaya pasien dan keluarganya yg mengambil obat bisa lebih nyaman dan ga ngabisin waktu cuma untuk menunggu pengambilan obat. Terimakasih.

name: Febrina nurdina
review: (Translated by Google) Fast service and friendly. clean place (Original) Cepat pelayannanya dan ramah. bersih tempatnya

name: Fikri Amrullah Muryasani
review: (Translated by Google) Medical personnel (especially specialist doctors) are expected to add hours of service, and CS and staff at registration are expected to provide clear information (not half). My experience here to change glasses through BPJS is not pleasant. Quick referral from the clinic is only 1 day, but when going to RSND must go back and forth. The first time I arrived was informed that poly was closed (I came during the day without checking the schedule on the web, because I thought the hospital was as big as the doctor's schedule), welcome to come again in the morning at 9am on Monday-Friday The second time I arrived around 9:00, I was informed that the queue number for the eye clinic had run out, and was welcome to come again but earlier This is related to the second point, clarity of information. Yes, if the queue number is easy to run out, why don't you recommend coming at 7 from the start? We are the same, that we all have our responsibilities and cannot at any time take the time to take care of this kind of thing Maybe what's wrong with me is choosing the reference here ... (Original) Tenaga medis (trutama dokter spesialis) diharapkan utk ditambah jam layananannya, dan utk CS serta petugas di pendaftaran diharapkan utk memberikan info yg jelas (jangan setengah2). Pengalaman saya kesini utk ganti kacamata melalui BPJS kurang menyenangkan. Rujukan dr klinik cepat hanya 1 hari, namun ketika ke RSND harus bolak balik. Pertama kali saya datang diinformasikan poli sudah tutup (saya datang siang hari tanpa mengecek jadwal di web, karna saya mengira rumah sakit sebesar ini jadwal dokternya banyak), dipersilakan utk datang lg pagi hari jam 9an pada hari senin-jumat Kedua kali saya datang skitar jam 9an, tapi diinfokan bahwa nomor antrian utk poli mata sudah habis, dan dipersilakan utk datang lg tapi lebih awal Hal tsb berkenaan dgn poin kedua, kejelasan informasi. Ya jika memang nomor antriannya mudah habis, kenapa dari awal tidak menyarankan utk datang jam 7 ? Kita sama2 taulah, bahwa kita semua punya ksibukan masing2 dan tidak bisa tiap saat menyempatkan diri utk mengurus hal semacam ini Mungkin yg jadi salah saya adalah memilih rujukan disini...

And the one who made me amazed, just when I was in control of the stitches, I was wrong to see the date. Sy, I arrived one day earlier when I was told. And after that day the dkter didn't have a seat there. So I tried to register, because my parents were quite far (40 min). Now that I have been pregnant secondhand I want to have a baby there, but I've been far away from there huhuhu. (Original) Ini rs yg plng baik menurut sy. Sy caesar 2th lalu dsini. Provide mental health consulting services, treatment and others. In addition, there is an outpatient clinic for acupuncture and consultation. Positive Value: 1. The facilities are quite complete 2. The facilities are pretty good after being renovated. 3. The parking area is quite spacious 4. The staff is quite friendly 5. The place is quite clean and comfortable 6. Clean toilets are available after renovation 7. Even the lift area after being renovated has become better and more comfortable 8. The waiting room looks cleaner now. It's still in the renovation stage, for building additions, so there are some places that are still a bit messy, but outside, so they don't disturb the comfort inside the hospital. (Original) Dr. Amino Gondohutomo Regional Psychiatric Hospital Merupakan Rumah Sakit Jiwa yang berada di daerah Pedurungan, Semarang. Menyediakan layanan konsultasi kesehatan jiwa, perawatan dan lain-lain. Selain itu terdapat klinik rawat jalan dari akupunktur maupun konsultasi. Nilai Positive: 1. Fasilitas lumayan lengkap 2. Fasilitas lumayan bagus setelah di renovasi. 3. Area parkir cukup luas 4. Staff cukup ramah 5. Tempat cukup bersih dan nyaman 6. Tersedia toilet yang bersih setelah direnovasi 7. Masi dalam tahap renovasi, untuk penambahan gedung, jadi ada beberapa tempat yang masih agak berantakan, tapi di luar, jadi tidak menganggu kenyamanan di dalam rumah sakit.

name: Endang Purwanti
review: (Translated by Google) So far it's been my favorite rsia from my brother's time. I think the facilities and services are more than adequate. Not too crowded so convenient for queuing and etc. Supporting facilities for mothers and children are complete. Especially in this covid season, hospitals that are not crowded are definitely more attractive because the risk is less. And coincidentally there is a pediatrician whom I intend to practice here, namely dr.Fitri. For the standard price, maybe what is rather good is the administration and medicine costs. The toilets and prayer rooms are clean and comfortable, the rooms are also quite good. Unfortunately, you can't use bpjs and insurance for outpatient care. (Original) Sejauh ini mnjdi rsia favoritku dr zaman kakakku. Menurutku fasilitas dan pelayanannya lebih dari cukup. Tidak terlalu ramai sehingga nyaman untuk antri dan dll. Fasilitas penunjang ibu dan anak ckup lengkap. Apalagi dimusim covid seperti ini RS yang tidak ramai pasti lebih diminati krna risikonya lebih sedikit. Dan kebtulan ada dokter anak yg memang aku tuju praktek disini yaitu dr.Fitri. Untuk harganya standart, mungkin yg agak lumayan adalah biaya administrasi dan obat‚Äùannya. Toilet dan mushola bersih nyaman, ruangan inap nya juga cukup bagus. Cuman sayangnya tidak bisa pakai bpjs dan asuransi pada rawat jalannya.

name: ela fatmawanti
review: (Translated by Google) *Google review form* *RSIA Kusuma Pradja* - Doctor's name: doctor anggi - Doctor's friendliness: masyaalloh doctor Anggi is very friendly person, his people are smooth and polite. He cares about the patient's SM. Can make the patient comfortable. - Doctor's service: very satisfying. I want to consult via wa. And if there is a problem, it is immediately followed up. - Doctor's communication: very communicative. Usually we are the ones who actively ask the doctor. But when Dr. Anggi always asks LG something, he always gives more information. Want to give a lot of time for patients during consultations... - Long wait check: it doesn't take much time to wait. The front office is also friendly and ready to serve questions from patients who need information - Hospital cleanliness: The hospital is very clean. The cleaning is 3x a day. Experience while staying at RSIA. morning, afternoon SM afternoon. I use class 2. The bathroom is outside the room, but masyaallah it's still comfortable to take a shower. Because cleanliness is maintained. - Hospitality of nurses and hospital staff: all nurses and staff are friendly, ready to serve the needs of patients. - Suggestions and inputs for doctors and hospitals: keep it up. everything is ok...God willing... (Original) *Form ulasan google review* *RSIA Kusuma Pradja* - Nama dokter : dokter anggi - Keramahan Dokter: masyaalloh dokter Anggi orangnya sangat ramah,orng nya halus dan sopan.peduli SM pasien. Bs membuat nyaman pasien. - Pelayanan Dokter: sangat memuaskan.mau konsultasi lewat wa.dan kalau ada masalah langsung di tindak lanjuti. - Komunikasi Dokter: komunikatif sekali.biasanya kita yang aktif nanya ke dokter.tp kl dokter Anggi selalu blg ada yang mau di tanyakan LG.dan sll memberikan informasi lebih. Mau memberikan banyak waktu untuk pasien saat konsultasi... - Lama tunggu periksa: tidak perlu banyak waktu untuk menunggu. Front office ny jg ramah2 siap melayani pertanyaan pasien yg membutuhkan informasi - Kebersihan RS: RS nya sangat bersih.pembersihannya sehari 3x ya. Pengalaman waktu mondok di RSIA.pagi,siang SM sore. Saya pakai kelas 2.kamar mandi di luar ruangan tp masyaalloh ttp nyaman kmr mandinya.karena kebersihannya di jaga. - Keramahan Perawat dan petugas RS: perawat dan petugasnya ramah2 semua.siap melayani kebutuhan pasien. - Saran dan masukan untuk Dokter dan RS : di pertahankan ya. semuanya sudah ok...insyalloh...

name: Bintang Biru
review: (Translated by Google) Still don't understand why this hospital has very limited insurance. There is no government or private insurance that can cover our birth costs later. Even office insurance was rejected. I personally know some of the reasons, but it seems that these reasons are not strong enough to satisfy my heart, which has been faithfully examined here. We as a family have been very diligent in protecting ourselves with insurance, but we are very disappointed that this long-established hospital has lost the courage of other new hospitals. To the owner of RSIA Kusuma Pradja, everyone knows that childbirth is expensive and only insurance can cover this financial objection. If your reason is only for the sake and smooth running of the hospital, then we are really disappointed about this. Therefore I will reconsider the place where I will give birth later. Thank you (Original) Masih belum mengerti mengapa RS ini asuransinya sangat terbatas. Asuransi pemerintah maupun swasta tidak ada yang bisa mengcover biaya lahiran kami nanti. Bahkan asuransi kantorpun juga ditolak. Saya pribadi tahu beberapa alasannya, tapi sepertinya alasan tersebut tidak cukup kuat untuk memuaskan hati saya yang memang sudah setia periksa di sini. Kami sekeluarga sudah sangat rajin untuk memproteksi diri dengan asuransi tapi sangat kecewa RS yang sudah berdiri lama ini kalah dengan keberanian RS baru lainnya. Kepada pemilik RSIA Kusuma Pradja, semua tahu bahwa biaya lahiran itu mahal dan hanya asuransi yang bisa mengcover keberatan finansial ini. Jika alasan Anda hanya untuk kepentingan dan kelancaran RS saja, maka kami benar-benar kecewa atas ini. Oleh karena itu saya akan mempertimbangkan kembali tempat di mana saya akan melahirkan nantinya. Terima kasih.

name: TUKE _WENY
review: (Translated by Google) I was there, on 22 August 2022 at 11.00 to do a survey from one of the survey institutions, when I submitted a letter etc to the cs section and I told them to wait in the waiting chair, I was waiting, suddenly Ms. 2 came and stood in front of me, even though next to me was a long chair and it was still empty. He said, standing up, what is this... why suddenly something like this (very rude) by standing up and handing over the letter (approximately 25-30 years old). I'll tell you my goal. blah blah.. even though I refuse, but I ask for atitude. (we don't ask for donations) we only do interviews / surveys.. I came in polite clothes and polite language even though, hopefully the mr can respect others more, whoever it is.. keep your attitude, sis.. refuse gpp.. but the way is to respect others more, sis.. :-) (Original) saya kesana,tgl 22 agustus 2022 jam 11.00 untk melakukan survay dari salah lembaga survay,ketika surat dll saya serahkan ke bagian cs dan saya suruh nunggu di kursi tggu,saya tggu,tiba tiba datang mbk 2..dan berdiri di depan saya,padahal di sebelah saya kursi panjang dan masih kosong.dia bilang,sambil berdiri ,ini apa apa an..kok tiba tiba ada kayak gini ( sangat tidak sopan sekali) dengan berdiri dan menyerah kan surat itu (usia kurang lebih25- 30 th nan).saya cerita tujuan saya.bla bla..walaupun menolak,tapi mohon untuk atitude.(kami tidak minta sumbangan) kami hanya melakukan intervr/survay..saya datang dengan pakaian sopan dan bahasa sopan padahal,smoga mbk nya lebih bisa menghargai orang lain,siapapun itu..jaga atitude ya mbk..menolak gpp..tapi cara nya lebih bisa menghargai orang lain ya mbk..:-)

name: Vitria Agustina
review: (Translated by Google) *Google review form* *RSIA Kusuma Pradja* - Doctor's name: doctor anggi - Doctor's Hospitality: friendly, polite and pleasant - Doctor's service: extraordinary in dealing with patients, very patient, thorough and the explanations are easy to understand, not in a hurry - Doctor communication: very detailed and very clear - Long waiting check: not too long - Hospital cleanliness: very clean - Hospitality of nurses and staff: very friendly - Testimonials during SC the Eracs method at Kusuma Hospital: I felt the eracs method at Kusuma Hospital was extraordinary, after leaving the op room I was immediately able to move my legs and tilted left and right, 2 hours after that I was able to practice walking, at 3 o'clock the catheter was removed, very enjoyable and fun, it turns out that the eracs method of cesarean operation is not as scary as I imagined, especially under the guidance of pleasant doctors.. thank you RSIA KUSUMA (Original) *Form ulasan google review* *RSIA Kusuma Pradja* - Nama dokter : dokter anggi - Keramahan Dokter: ramah , sopan dan menyenangkan - Pelayanan Dokter: luar biasa dalam menangani pasien sangat sabar , teliti dan penjelasan mudah sekali untuk di pahami, tidak terburu buru - Komunikasi Dokter: sangat detail dan jelas sekali - Lama tunggu periksa: tidak terlalu lama - Kebersihan RS: sangat bersih - Keramahan Perawat dan petugas RS: sangat ramah - Testimoni selama SC metode Eracs di RS Kusuma: saya merasakan metode eracs di RS kusuma sangat luar biasa, setelah keuar dr ruang op saya langsung bisa menggerakan kaki dan miring kanan kiri, 2 jam setelahnya saya bisa latihan jalan, jam 3 sudah lepas kateter, sangt enjoy dan menyenangkan, ternyata op sesar metode eracs tidak seseram yg sy bayangkan, apalagi di pandu dokter2 yg menyenangkan.. terima kasih RSIA KUSUMA

name: Desy Chamim
review: (Translated by Google) I was comfortable checking here when I was my first child because the doctors were kind and friendly (dr. Retno, dr. Vannya, dr. Lubena). I've been to those 3 doctors. But what annoyed me was the birth process. At that time I was in the VK room. only 2cm opening but some of the midwives/nurses at VK have offered to me "just don't SC, ma'am, because like this it usually takes a long time and will SC." Those words were uttered by several midwives to me. Even though at that time the doctor ordered observation dl. But if the midwife in the inpatient room is kind and considerate For RSIA Kusuma, please re-train the Midwives and Nurses to maintain the ethics of speaking to patients. If necessary, find or provide training for Midwives/Nurses so that they are pro-vaginal/normal births. Since then, my 2nd pregnancy has been transferred to the hospital even though I really want to come back here to check with dr. Lubena, SPOG and dr. Fitri, SPA (Original) Saya nyaman periksa di sini saat anak pertama karena dokternya baik¬≤ dan ramah (dr. Retno, dr. Vannya, dr. Lubena) saya pernah periksa ke 3 dokter tsb. Tp yg membuat saya kesal itu saat proses kelahiran. Wkt itu saya di ruang VK. baru pembukaan 2cm tp beberapa Bidan/Perawatnya di VK sudah menawarkan ke saya "ga SC saja bu, karena klo kayak gini biasanya lama dan bakalan SC." Kata¬≤ itu dilontarkan oleh beberapa Bidan ke saya. Padahal wkt itu dokternya suruh observasi dl. Tp kalo Bidan di ruang rawat inapnya baik dan perhatian Untuk RSIA Kusuma, tolong dibina kembali para Bidan dan Perawatnya agar menjaga etika bicaranya kepada pasien. Kalau perlu cari atau beri pelatihan Bidan/Perawat agar mereka pro kelahiran pervaginam/ normal. Sejak itu, kehamilan ke 2 saya menjadi pindah RS padahal saya ingin sekali kembali kesini periksa dg dr. Lubena, SPOG dan dr. Fitri, SPA

name: Nofi Pitriani
review: (Translated by Google) This is the first time I checked at RSIA Kusuma Pradja, I did a 2d ultrasound for a friendly doctor, but I don't know if we don't ask for a print, we won't get the printout. (Original) Ini baru pertama saya periksa ke RSIA Kusuma Pradja, Saya melakukan usg 2d untuk dokter ramah,tapi saya tidak tau kalo tidak minta di cetak kita tidak dapat hasil cetakanya. name: wilbexer connor
review: (Translated by Google) The hospital's not right. The place is small, narrow, but the patients who come are mostly groups of families. Seating is very limited and is not limited by the distance according to Covid procedures, many visitors are forced to stand, the air in the room is hot, tight without air conditioning, not to mention the very fat purple nurse who comes out of the doctor's room fitri spa, immediately pinches my baby with her hands dirty, as if they don't care about the transmission of the covid19 virus. Judging from the insolent behavior of the obese nurse who does not have a brain and the way a hospital that does not have a covid procedure in regulating visitor bench distances, hot and narrow air circulation, you should HEART or stay away from this hospital altogether. Hopefully this will be the monitoring material for the Covid 19 task force to regulate inconsequential hospitals like this, including staff and nurses need to be upgraded again to understand the importance of maintaining distance and not holding hands to spread the diseases of most other people's children. SEVERE! Bad management, bad tbsp, no hospital. (Original) Rumah sakit gak beres. Tempatnya kecil, sempit, tapi pasien yang datang banyak kebanyakan rombongan sekeluarga. Tempat duduk sangat terbatas gak dibatasi jarak sesuai prosedur covid, banyak pengunjung yang terpaksa berdiri, udara dalam ruangan panas sesak tanpa AC, belum lagi perawat berbaju ungu sangat gendut yg keluar dari ruangan dokter fitri spa, langsung dgn seenaknya mencubit memegang2 anak bayi saya dengan tangannya yang kotor, seolah gak peduli penularan virus covid19. Dilihat dari perilaku kurang ajar perawatnya yang gendut gak punya otak itu dan cara RS yg tidak memiliki prosedur covid dalam mengatur jarak bangku pengunjung, sirkulasi udara yg panas dan sempit, sebaiknya HATI HATI atau jauhi sama sekali rumah sakit yg satu ini. Semoga ini jadi bahan pengawasan gugus tugas covid 19 untuk mentertibkan rumah sakit ngawur seperti ini, termasuk staff dan perawatnya perlu di tatar lagi untuk paham pentingnya jaga jarak dan gak seenaknya memegang megang untuk menyebar penyakit kebanyakan anak orang lain. PARAH! Manajemen buruk, sdm buruk, RS gak berek pokoknya.
